main event: On 29th September 1955, a sighting of a flat, red/orange object was reported. It appeared and disappeared without sound, moved faster than an aircraft, orbited twice, and then moved south.
interesting points: The object was described as flat and red on appearance, orange on disappearance.
No sound was reported, and it was observed to be faster than an aircraft.
The object made specific directional movements, including orbiting twice before moving south.
The witness initially thought it was an aircraft, but it was later evaluated as an unidentified object.
The report does not mention any photographs taken of the object.
